key.name: window-width
key.description: Width of the application window in pixels

key.name: window-height
key.description: Height of the application window in pixels

key.name: is-maximized
key.description: Whether the window is maximized

key.name: is-fullscreen
key.description: Whether the window is fullscreen

key.name: sidebar-visible
key.description: Whether the sidebar is visible

key.name: sidebar-width
key.description: Width of the sidebar in pixels

key.name: editor-font
key.description: Font used in the editor

key.name: editor-tab-width
key.description: Width of a tab character in spaces

key.name: editor-use-spaces
key.description: Whether to use spaces instead of tabs for indentation

key.name: editor-show-line-numbers
key.description: Whether to show line numbers in the editor

key.name: editor-highlight-current-line
key.description: Whether to highlight the current line in the editor

key.name: editor-auto-indent
key.description: Whether to automatically indent new lines

key.name: editor-wrap-text
key.description: Whether to wrap long lines in the editor

key.name: editor-show-right-margin
key.description: Whether to show the right margin in the editor

key.name: editor-right-margin-position
key.description: Position of the right margin in characters

key.name: editor-spell-check
key.description: Whether to enable spell checking in the editor

key.name: editor-spell-check-language
key.description: Language code for spell checking (empty for system default)

key.name: preview-auto-refresh
key.description: Whether to automatically refresh the preview when the document is modified

key.name: preview-refresh-delay
key.description: Delay in milliseconds before refreshing the preview after document changes

key.name: preview-zoom-level
key.description: Zoom level for the preview (1.0 = 100%)

key.name: latex-engine
key.description: Engine used to compile LaTeX documents (pdflatex, xelatex, lualatex)

key.name: latex-options
key.description: Command line options passed to the LaTeX engine

key.name: latex-bibtex-engine
key.description: Engine used to compile bibliographies (bibtex, biber)

key.name: color-scheme
key.description: Color scheme for the application (system, light, dark)

key.name: last-open-directory
key.description: Path to the last directory used to open or save files

key.name: recent-files
key.description: List of recently opened files

key.name: recent-projects
key.description: List of recently opened projects

key.name: autosave-enabled
key.description: Whether to automatically save documents periodically

key.name: autosave-interval
key.description: Interval in seconds between automatic saves
